alert.note: Alert for Aurora; Brule; Davison; Hanson; Lake; McCook; Minnehaha; Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 14 at 8:41PM MST until December 16 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Southwest to west winds 25 to 35 mph, with gusts up to 65 mph expected. The highest threat for very strong winds will be during the late afternoon and evening. * WHERE...Portions of east central, south central and southeast South Dakota and southwest Minnesota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 3 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some patchy light snow may combine with the strong winds to cause brief reductions in visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Aurora; Brule; Davison; Hanson; Lake; McCook; Minnehaha; Moody
